title: karuNakaram srikaram
sahitya:
karuNAkaram shrIkaram kalayE dAmOdaram guruvAyupurEshvaram tribhuvanAdhIshvaram

anupallavi

 nirupama kOmalam nIradhara shyAmalam suravairi kula kAlam lOlAbAlam gOpAlam

caraNam

 naraka nAshanam nAlikEkSaNam nArAyaNam narakula sharaNam svabhakta parAyaNam 
muralI mOhanam shOka haraNam ramAramaNam muravibhISaNam vana tulasI vibhUSaNam
